author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

This is a follow-up to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/39771 and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/38761 in order to be able to fully monitor the SoA products for pixel rechits, tracks and vertices for both the phase-1 and phase-2 upgrade detectors.
As promised in #39771 I also deliver the renaming of all classes and packages from `SiPixelPhase1Heterogeneous` to `SiPixelHeterogeneous` in commit https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/40264/commits/64ac830984e24840bffe82618eb795c20a59098c

#### PR validation:

Run successfully 

```
runTheMatrix.py --what upgrade -l 20834.507 -t 4 -j 8
```

and obtained plots for RecHits, Tracks and Vertices.
